page.title: 17PRINCIPAL FEATURES
page.content: GRID SQUARE 9 The principal feature of the area,that characterises the area,is very much a legacy of the late 1920's/early 1930's.That is the pattern of,on the whole, semi-detached houses with linear back gardens. Another principal feature which characterises the area in 1985 is that of Northway Circus(Apex Corner).Two major arterial roads in and out of London,the A1 and the A41 join at the roundabout.At rushhour times the traffic,particularly on the A41 side, can be jammed back on both sides of the roundabout.Yet,it is not merely a roundabout because on a lower level it is a series of pedestrian walkways to enable foot travellers to cross what would otherwise be a very dangerous series of roads.
